page.title: 20LANDSCAPE NEWTOWN LINFORD
page.content: Newtown linford is a small but very pretty village. It has a small school with about 35 pupils,a cricket ground, a village hall and two restaurants. The main attraction is Bradgate Park. Most people do not work in the village because there is only a post office and a small food shop. Nearly every house has a large garden. In summer many tourists come to the village and to Bradgate Park. There is a Working Men's Club which has snooker and a bar. There is a Sunday School for children and a church for adults.As soon as children are eleven they can join the Crusaders where you do bible readings, go camping and play sports.The village has two farms.A new cafe has just opened. There is a garden centre which sells sheds,greenhouses and plants.
